text: State of Bacon is a 2014 American Icelandic documentary movie directed and written by Jason Cook. It features David Anthony Higgins, "Hacksaw Jim" Duggan, Chuck Grassley and Terry Branstad. ==Other websites== * State of Bacon at the Internet Movie Database Category:2014 documentary movies Category:American documentary movies Category:Icelandic movies Category:Movies about food and drink Category:Movies set in Iowa
title: State of Bacon
